sentences.sentence: Verily I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.
sentences.translation: 我实在告诉你们，你们中有个人要背叛我了。

sentences.sentence: Verily, that is the way of the world.
sentences.translation: 的确，这就是世界运转方式。

sentences.sentence: Verily this is a lie—he would not go.
sentences.translation: 这肯定是个谎言——他不会走的。
